Home.proofStrip: Go • React Native • PostgreSQL • Production Apps • Remote Collaboration
Home.positioningLine: Open to full-time backend-focused roles (remote or hybrid).
Home.aboutBody: Backend-focused fullstack engineer with an architecture mindset. I build maintainable systems with strong long-term reliability and collaborate remotely from Guadeloupe.
Home.impactPoint1: Led backend Go refactor initiatives to improve clarity and scalability.
Home.impactPoint2: Delivered production React Native features with end-to-end ownership.
Home.impactPoint3: Embedded observability thinking across delivery and operations.
Home.impactPoint4: Prioritized long-term quality over short-term patchwork.

ArchitecturePage.metaDescription: System overview of the mobile app, API layer, services, and platform integrations.
ArchitecturePage.title: Architecture
ArchitecturePage.subtitle: A practical view of how client, backend, and platform services work together in production.
ArchitecturePage.comingSoonBody: I am preparing detailed write-ups on scalability, reliability, and product architecture.
ArchitecturePage.overviewSubtitle: Mobile clients send requests through the Go API, which coordinates domain services and platform integrations.

mobile.title: Mobile
mobile.bullet1: Captures user intent and interaction events.
mobile.bullet2: Consumes typed API endpoints for content and actions.

api.title: API
api.bullet1: Handles auth, validation, and request shaping.
api.bullet2: Routes traffic to domain services with low latency.

services.title: Services
services.bullet1: Executes event discovery, ranking, and lifecycle rules.

postgres.title: Postgres
postgres.role: System of record for relational data
postgres.bullet1: Stores users, events, and transactional state.
postgres.bullet2: Supports query patterns for filtered discovery.

fcm.title: FCM
fcm.bullet2: Supports segmented messaging per audience context.

observability.title: Observability
observability.bullet1: Tracks latency, errors, and dependency health.
observability.bullet2: Speeds diagnosis with correlated telemetry signals.

overviewSection.title: Overview
overviewSection.point1: Single API gateway for mobile traffic.

decisionsSection.title: Key Decisions
decisionsSection.point1: Go API for predictable latency and simple ops.
decisionsSection.point3: Observability by default on every request path.

scalingSection.title: Scaling Scenarios
scalingSection.point1: Horizontal API scale behind a stateless edge.
scalingSection.point2: Async workers for ingestion and fan-out tasks.
scalingSection.point3: Cache + query tuning for read-heavy traffic.
